alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 10 at 2:29PM CDT until June 16 at 2:35AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Arkansas... Ouachita River At Camden affecting Ouachita and Calhoun Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ouachita River At Camden. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Low lying pastures and timber land along the river begins to flood. Sandy Beach Park at Camden starts to flood. At 28.0 feet, Sandy Beach Park and portions of the Riverwalk area off of Washington Street are inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to rise and is forecast to rise above flood stage Monday morning (June 13) and continue to rise to 29.0 feet by Tuesday morning (June 14). - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 1 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Crest Time Date Ouachita River Camden 26.0 16.9 Fri 1 PM 17.5 21.1 27.0 17.8 1 AM 6/11 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
